status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Since Android doesn't provide the coordinates we're not adding them to the event. Also touch is not required to click a row and other selections via the keyboard or trackball would not have a coordinate.

Is it possible for coordinates to be passed in the touch case?

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Research if coordinates can be passed from TableView on click

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is hardly any information whatsoever and this was created in April 2011 with no response since that time.
